answers.answer: Have you tried  tumeric on the wound ?  It's a Eastern therapy
If she has uncontrolled diabetes— her wounds will not heal! She could be developing gangrene in the area! She needs to get to a Dr anyway possible this could become a deadly situation!

question: The patient is a 92 year old womanShe has no easy access to medical care due to her geographic locationThe wound has existed for many years and is getting biggerShe thinks it was caused by a fall or scratchThe wound is about 10 cm by 4 cmAny suggestions will be welcomed please
title: Unhealed wound on 92 year old
